revised_title: Embryological Development of Cheyletus eruditus: A Mite
tldr: This study investigates the embryological development of Cheyletus eruditus, a mite, from the time the egg is laid until hatching. The research provides a detailed account of the formation of germ layers and the development of various organs in the mite. The findings contribute to the understanding of early development in mites and Acarina as a whole.
